titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain catalytic converter mats of ceramic fibers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
1/15/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide, through December 31, 2011, for the temporary suspension of duty on certain catalytic converter mats of ceramic fibers.
